item.description:
"CLINK!" is an upscale restaurant located on the SECOND floor of the Liberty Hotel on The Charles River, Beacon Hill, Boston. The was the historic jail house in Boston converted into an upscale restaurant and hotel with two bars.

At 6:00pm ..Please join me for cocktails, raw bar and "TGIF Happy Hour Snack Menu" offered every Friday

Local Oysters with Champagne Mignonette … 1.50 each
Mixed Nuts with Marinated Olives … 3
Edamame with Sea Salt … 3
Skinny Fries with Harissa Aioli … 4
Veal and Ricotta Meatball Sliders with Crispy Sage … 5
Beef Tartare with Arugula, Spicy Aioli and Crostini* … 6
Steamed Mussels with Lemongrass, Ginger and Saffron … 7

Early Birds Note: At 5:30, there is a complimentary cocktail making demonstration (under 150 calories) at "The Liberty Bar" (Go up the escalator to the second floor).

At 6:00, Go to the SECOND FLOOR to the "CLINK! Restaurant", you can ask "Lauren" or the "Fun with Alcohol" Meetup Group in the restaurant lobby. We will be seated at a booth(s) just outside of the restaurant dining area. Enjoy a cocktail, wine or beer and you may order from the TGIF snack menu, appetizer reg. price menu and raw bar.



www.libertyhotel.com/clink/TGIF_Snack.pdf

Conveniently located @ MGH stop on the T Red Line
item.name: CLINK! @ the Liberty Hotel
